# Vaelandor Shieldsworn

**Shield-Bearer** | Eternal Guard

> *"I am the last thing between danger and the Emperor. I will not move."*

| | |
|---|---|
| **Age** | 380 years |
| **Race** | High Elf, Male |
| **Role** | Emperor's Personal Bodyguard |
| **Reports To** | Captain Thandril Ironsong |
| **Location** | Within arm's reach of Emperor Valandor |

---

## Overview

Vaelandor Shieldsworn is the Emperor's shadow—where Valandor goes, Vaelandor follows. He stands behind the Eternal Throne during audiences, walks three steps behind the Emperor in corridors, and sleeps in the antechamber outside the Imperial bedchamber. He is the last line of defense, and he has never failed.

---

## Personality & Approach

Silent, vigilant, utterly focused. Rarely speaks except to acknowledge orders. Has trained his body to remain motionless for hours while maintaining combat readiness. Shows no personality on duty; off duty (rare), surprisingly warm. The job consumes everything else.

---

## Key Facts

- Selected from 500 candidates for personal bodyguard role
- Has served at the Emperor's side for 150 years
- Survived three assassination attempts on Valandor (stopped all)
- Sleeps only 4 hours per night (elven discipline)

---

## Secret (DM Only)

He loves the Emperor—not romantically, but with absolute devotion. If ordered to let Valandor die to save the Empire, he would refuse. His duty is to one elf, not to institutions. This may be his greatest strength or greatest weakness.

---

## Connections

- **Thandril Ironsong**: Commander - Absolute obedience
- **Emperor Valandor**: Ward - His entire purpose
- **Miravel Dawnseeker**: Colleague - Both serve the Emperor directly
